about.title: Learn more about me
about.text-1: A computer enthusiast since my youth, I explored programming long before becoming a web developer. For me, each line of code is a work of art, an endless exploration of creation.
about.text-2: My commitment to this field is more than a career; it's a boundless passion, an adventure I will pursue with determination until my hands can no longer glide over a keyboard.
about.text-3: Today, I am ready to put these skills to work on your projects. Together, we can create dynamic, optimized, and bug-free websites. I'm eager to help you bring your ideas to life and make your projects a reality.

experience.title: The key stages of my journey
experience.text: Driven to excel in my field, I am fueled by an unwavering passion for the web and constantly strive to push my limits to offer exceptional web solutions to my future clients.

contact.title: Do you have a question, a proposal, or a project in mind? I'm ready to collaborate with you on anything that interests you!
